channel.title: Project TitanX 718/742 | Automated Double EXP| XP Rings | ToolBelt | HC Iron MaN
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1vdFjxD.png[/img]
[URL=http://project-titanx.ddns.net]Home[/URL] [URL=http://project-titanx.ddns.net/forums]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://project-titanx.ddns.net/mmo/what-is-titanx.html]Server Description[/URL] [URL=http://project-titanx.ddns.net/clients]Download[/URL]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DWz5aNt.png[/img]
[B]Welcome[/B] Get ready to see the best content-wise server online. PvM/Economy based but PKing is welcome Project TitanX offers all 25 RS718 skills, well combat, active pvm, unique minigames, 100% stability combined with staff professionalism, unique interfaces, and a beautiful game-play. We promise you to have nice game-play and to enjoy the friendly community. Donating for ranks IS NOT required. We do weekly giveaways for items, exp boosts, drops and donator ranks.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DWz5aNt.png[/img]
[B]Stability[/B] Project TitanX contains little to no bugs, since release there has not been one dupe found, keep in mind Project TitanX is written well by Beast(HostRaptor). There has not been any rollbacks. The game has never crashed due to a coding mistake. Cheat engines are absolutely useless on the server.. The server is very optimized, don't expect any lag at all whilst playing.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DWz5aNt.png[/img]
- Double XP Well. - Charm Seekers'. - Mineral Deposit Mining. - Advanced Agility Courses. - Full Resource dungeons. - Custom Bosses. - Slayer Task Bosses. - Bonecrusher. - Perfect Gem Cutting. - 100% Glacors. - Iron Man Mode. - Prestige System. - Flawless Switching - Achievement Diary. - Achievement Point System. - Very Clean Economy. - 100% Toolbelt - IronMan Modes. - Clue Scrolls. - Full Working Farming (99%). - Fully Working PuroPuro. - Level Point System (Custom). - Trivia (Custom). - All Skill Dialogues - Squeal Of Fortune. - All Agility Courses. - CompReqs. - Highscores. - Full GWD. - Shooting Stars. - Slayer (90%). - All Skills Trainable. - Fully Working Alchemy, Enchanting. - Donator Zone (Custom). - Working Golden Mining Armour. - LRC Fully Functional. - 100% Barrows Brothers. - Fully working Charming Imp. - Stable exp Rates. - 100% Warriors Guild.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DWz5aNt.png[/img]
Skills:
Fishing - All fish can be caught - Barbarian fishing - LRC Rocktail, Cavefish - Bait required for some fishing spots
Cooking - All Fish can be cooked - Fish burning with correct levels - Cooking gloves - Lumbridge range provides a lower burn chance
Prayer: - All bones buriable - All bones can be used on an altar - All prayers & curses work - Can combine god pages to make the books
Fletching - All logs cuttable - Stringing bows - Arrows - Bolts - Pick and spin flax
Agility - Gnome Agility Course + Advanced - Barbarian Agility Course + Advanced - Wilderness Agility Course - Ape Atoll Agility
Hunter - 100% Puro Puro - Chinchompas - Bird Snares - Falconry - Butterflies
Mining - 100% Lava Mine - 100% Living Rrock Cavern - Custom Mining Animation - All ores minable
Firemaking - Bon Fires 100% + Health boost - Fire Spirit - Backwards firmaking - All logs burnable - Ring of fire/flame gloves - 100% inferno adze - Beacons - Barbarian Firemaking
Runecrafting - All runes are craftable - RuneSpan - Abyss - Multiple runes
Smithing - Correct Smithing Interface's - All armours smithable - All weapons smithable - DFS Creation - Spirit Shield Creation
Woodcutting - 100% inferno adze - All trees can be cut - All hatchets can be used - Random bird nests - Correct stump ids - Jadinko and ivy cutting
Slayer - Kuradal's dungeon - Slayer bosses - NPC's are slayer level based - Slayer helmet works/recolouring - Great XP rates - Lots of tasks w/point shop
Farming - 99.9% Farming Trees, Herbs, Flowers, Produce.
Summoning - All Familiars - Special Attacks for all familiars - Pouch creation - Scroll creation - Active familiars with correct saving and timings - Pets - All obelisks work
Thieving - Pickpocketing - Stalls - Chance of stealing up to quadruple loot - Wearing thieving outfit boosts XP
Dungeoneering (Custom For Now) - 3 Dungeoneering Locations - Low Level Dungeoneering - Medium Level Dungeoneering - High Level Dungeoneering[/ADMIN]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DWz5aNt.png[/img]
Combat - Item Soaking - Item Degrading - Full clipping - Perfect combat projectiles - Damage handling 100% - All special attacks - Poison weaps - Enchanted bolt effects
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DWz5aNt.png[/img]
Magic - All ancient and modern spells - Enchant jewellery - Enchant bolts - All combat spells - All teleport spells with 100% lodestones - Teleblocks
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DWz5aNt.png[/img]
Minigames - Troll invasion - Warriors guild - Soul wars - Pest control - Rise of the six - Barrows - Clan wars - Duel arena - Dominion tower - Fight caves and kiln full waves Many more
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DWz5aNt.png[/img]
Bosses - Corporeal Beast - GodWars Bosses - Tormented demons - Har lakk the riftsplitter - Yk lagor the thunderous - Skeletal horror - Sea troll queen - Nex 100% - KBD - Dks - Avatar of destruction - Sunfreet - Lucien - Party Demon - Blink - Hope devourer - KQ - Mercenary mage - Runebound behemoth - Kal Ger the warmonger - Bork and many more
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DWz5aNt.png[/img]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3SRtis7.png[/img][/CENTER]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DWz5aNt.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OK2fVnp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HHT17qg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ObLXTqZ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ChGRyB0.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6Vtl56E.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rmh3PjO.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eiYDTFC.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aCT01ID.jpg[/img]

[/CENTER]

item.description:
@123qwe wrote:

[CENTER]

[URL=http://project-titanx.ddns.net]Home[/URL]
[URL=http://project-titanx.ddns.net/forums]Forums[/URL]
[URL=http://project-titanx.ddns.net/mmo/what-is-titanx.html]Server Description[/URL]
[URL=http://project-titanx.ddns.net/clients]Download[/URL]

[B]Welcome[/B]
Get ready to see the best content-wise server online. PvM/Economy based but PKing is welcome
Project TitanX offers all 25 RS718 skills, well combat, active pvm, unique minigames, 100% stability combined with staff professionalism, unique interfaces, and a beautiful game-play.
We promise you to have nice game-play and to enjoy the friendly community. Donating for ranks IS NOT required. We do weekly giveaways for items, exp boosts, drops and donator ranks.

[B]Stability[/B]
Project TitanX contains little to no bugs, since release there has not been one dupe found, keep in mind Project TitanX is written well by Beast(HostRaptor). There has not been any rollbacks. The game has never crashed due to a coding mistake. Cheat engines are absolutely useless on the server… The server is very optimized, don’t expect any lag at all whilst playing.
